hero.title2: We drive projects that transform realities at a global level
hero.description: Specialists in evaluation, monitoring, design and advice on projects and policies development at a global level

aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.p1: International Impact & Social Economy Consulting (ISE), is an international consulting firm, specialized in the strategic management of international cooperation programs and social economy projects.
aboutUs.p2: Located in the Grand Duchy of Luxembourg, our consulting firm bridges Europe and the world. We work with government agencies, companies and entities from the public and private sectors around the world to improve the quality of services offered to communities in terms of:

sectors.title: We work in sectors such as:
sectors.transportDescription: Transportation systems and sustainable mobility solutions

executiveDirector.name: Anais Chacón
executiveDirector.description: Our Executive Director, Anais Chacón, has solid academic training in International Relations and Diplomacy, backed by more than 15 years of experience in international cooperation projects, in situ, providing advice to various developing countries, especially in Latin America.
executiveDirector.quote: I am committed to the development of the countries in which we work, with the aim of improving the quality of life of the people who live there.
executiveDirector.description2: At International Impact & Social Economy Consulting (ISE), we are ready to accompany you with our services in the social development and international cooperation sector, providing experience, innovation and commitment.

callToAction.title: Interested in learning more about International Impact & Social Economy Consulting?

servicesSection.title: Our Services
servicesSection.description: We focus on offering solutions tailored to the needs of our clients and the particularities of each sector. Our transformation formula is recognized by the United Nations and by a large number of member countries of the European Union.

service1.title: Research and Innovation in the social economy sector
service1.description: Identification of needs and opportunities, we analyze the main problems, challenges and emerging trends that affect social economy entities (cooperatives, associations, foundations, social enterprises, etc.). Design and execution of applied research projects, we develop qualitative and quantitative research, including case studies, comparative analysis, surveys and in-depth interviews. We promote social innovation, facilitate collaborative processes (innovation laboratories, co-creation, social hackathons) to design novel and sustainable solutions to specific social problems.

service2.title: Technical advisory services for international cooperation and social economy projects
service2.description: Through project formulation and design, we support the conceptualization and technical structuring of projects aligned with the Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs), international cooperation priorities and social economy frameworks. We develop logical frameworks, theories of change, budgets and schedules, ensuring coherence between objectives, activities and indicators. We assist in writing proposals for funding calls (EU, cooperation agencies, foundations, etc.).

service3.title: Project management: Design, evaluation, development, monitoring and follow-up
service3.description: We design monitoring systems with qualitative and quantitative indicators that allow measuring the progress, results and impact of projects. We conduct intermediate and final evaluations, incorporating learnings and practical recommendations for continuous improvement.

service4.title: Public policy advisory and strategic alliances
service4.description: From International Impact & Social Economy Consulting (ISE), we offer specialized advisory services for the analysis, design and strengthening of public policies that promote the social economy, as well as for the creation of strategic alliances that generate sustainable and transformative impact. We conduct diagnostics on regulatory frameworks, public programs and national/regional strategies that affect the social economy sector.

service5.title: Training and capacity building
service5.description: We diagnose training needs, evaluate the level of existing capacities in organizations or territories, identifying key gaps and priorities. We design customized training plans, aligned with the strategic objectives of each actor. We offer specialized workshops, courses and modules (face-to-face, virtual or hybrid) on topics such as: Management of social economy organizations, Social innovation and purpose-driven entrepreneurship, Participatory governance and collective leadership, Project formulation and management with impact approach, Strategic alliances and international cooperation, Social impact measurement, Access to financing and European funds.
